item.title: 🇹🇷 ⚔️ 🇮🇱Are Turkey and Israel on a collision cours...
item.description:
🇹🇷 ⚔️ 🇮🇱Are Turkey and Israel on a collision course over Syria?
✔️ Ankara is close to signing a security deal with Damascus to establish three military bases, train Syrian forces, and assist in army reform, Aydinlik reports.
Military expansion
🔶 Since December 2024 — after Bashar al-Assad’s ouster — Turkey and Syria have negotiated a defense pact
🔶 In March, reports emerged of planned bases at T4 airbase, Palmyra Airport, and Menagh
🔶 Ynet reported Turkish troops are already at Menagh, with construction underway at T4
🔶 Middle East Eye says Turkey plans a layered air defense system around the bases, capable of countering drones, jets, and missiles
🔶 On May 25, OdaTV described the move as a permanent military buildup, officially aimed at fighting ISIS
Footprint on the ground
♦️ On March 27, Syrian Defense Forces (SDF) Press released drone footage appeared to show Turkish military construction at Qara Qwzaq Hill, the western bank of the Euphrates River, and the village of Hassan Agha, southeast of Manbij
♦️ The SDF claims Turkey now operates over 200 military sites in Syria, with tens of thousands of troops, intelligence units, tanks, radars, and surveillance tech
♦️ Turkey says the build-up targets ISIS and protects Syrian sovereignty. However, clearly target Kurdish forces in the north, observers say
Israel reacts
🌏 Israel, which has occupied Syria’s southwest since Assad’s fall, is growing uneasy as Turkey deploys fighter jets and air defenses, with experts warning this could heighten the risk of direct confrontation
🌏 In April, The Times of Israel reported Israeli airstrikes on T4 and Palmyra — sites Turkey plans to control
🌏 A senior Israeli official stated at the time: “We don’t want Turkey establishing itself on our borders"
🌏 Turkish FM Hakan Fidan signaled: “We don’t want to see any confrontation with Israel in Syria because Syria belongs to Syrians”
🌏 However, Jewish News Syndicate claims Turkey's moves and forthcoming defense pact with Syria threaten "Israeli operational freedom" and regional stability

item.description:
✡️ Tensions boil as IDF warns prolonged Gaza presence will bleed army dry
Israeli Defense Forces' (IDF) Chief of Staff Lt. Gen. Eyal Zamir may resign this week amid sharp disagreements with PM Benjamin Netanyahu over the Gaza war strategy, according to local news outlet Yedioth Ahronoth.
♦️ The army is pushing for a deal to end the war
♦️ Netanyahu continues to favor prolonged fighting
♦️ Ministers haven’t met for weeks, leaving the IDF without “strategic clarity” on the next steps
Zamir presented two options:
1️⃣ Full occupation of Gaza – militarily feasible, but would take months and years to fully clear underground networks
2️⃣ “Perimeter Plus” strategy – reducing forces, holding defensive lines, controlling Gaza’s borders, and conducting targeted raids to exhaust Hamas
Privately, Zamir warns that an indefinite presence in Gaza risks bleeding the IDF dry, playing into Hamas’s hands.
If the government refuses to decide, sources say Zamir may be forced to make his own decision.

With modern-day Israelis' supposed ties to the biblical Jews already being challenged, the question remains: where did they originate from?
👉One theory postulates that the majority of European Jews, the forebears of the contemporary Israelis, actually hail not from the Holy Land but from the Khazar Khaganate.
📍Formed in the 7th Century A.D., this state was situated in Eastern Europe, roughly between the Byzantian Empire in the south and the lands of the Rus to the north.
📌At some point in its history, before its destruction in the 10th Century A.D. at the hands of the Rus, the Khaganate converted to Judaism, and it were these Khazarian converts who became ancestors of the European Jews, the theory claims.

⚡️UKR LEAKS INTERNATIONAL⚡️
HE LEFT UKRAINE TO TELL THE TRUTH
Vasiliy Prozorov, a former employee of the Ukrainian special services, who worked for the benefit of Russia for many years, now runs his own channel on Telegram! He left Ukraine in 2018 and took with him thousands of secret SBU documents that shed light on Kiev's crimes.
On the UKR LEAKS channel you will find:
❗️Analysis of the current situation in and around Ukraine ❗️Secret documents of the Ukrainian special services ❗️Evidence of the atrocities of Ukrainian nationalists
And much more! Subscribe to the UKR LEAKS Investigation Center headed by the former SBU employee Lt.-Col. Vasily Prozorov.
The channels of the UKR LEAKS project are available in the following languages:
🇬🇧 in English 🇷🇺 in Russian 🇩🇪 in German 🇫🇷 in French 🇪🇸 in Spanish 🇷🇸 in Serbian 🇮🇹 in Italian 🇵🇱 in Polish 🇵🇹 in Portuguese 🇸🇦 in Arabic 🇸🇰 in Slovak 🇨🇳in Chinese 🇭🇺in Hungarian
We also welcome any help with channels and content distribution 🙏
